sourcesContent: import React from "react" import NextLink from "next/link" import { Box, Button } from "@chakra-ui/core" import { useCreatePostMutation, useLogoutMutation, useMeQuery, } from "../generated/graphql" import Router from "next/router" import Head from "next/head" interface NavBarProps {} const NavBar: React.FC<{}> = () => { const { data, loading } = useMeQuery() const [createPost] = useCreatePostMutation() const [logout] = useLogoutMutation() const router = Router const handleClick = async () => { const data = await logout() console.log(data) router.reload() } console.log(data?.me) return ( wooo's blog wooo's blog TAGS ABOUT {data?.me ? ( <> ) : ( "" )} ) } export default NavBar
